description: Geared to climb – crag, gym, approach – the Konseals’ advanced design combines durability, performance and comfort with a look that easily goes off the rock. The fabric combines cotton’s natural softness and breathability, nylon’s strength, and elastane’s stretch. A gusseted crotch and articulated knees free you to move, tapered legs improve line of sight to your feet, the low-profile waist rides comfortably under a harness and pockets include an easy-access zippered one at the thigh.
name: Arcteryx Konseal Pants, Reg - Mens
